text: nīvu atyuttama samudāyadavaru. Nim'mannu sampūrṇa mānava samājakkāgi niyōjisalāgide. Nīvu (janarige) satkāryagaḷannu ādēśisuvavaru hāgū (avarannu) keṭṭa kr̥tyagaḷinda taḍeyuvavaru mattu allāhanalli viśvāsa uḷḷavaru. Granthadavaru (satya dharmavannu) nambiddare, adu avara pālige uttamavāgiruttittu. Avarallū kelavu viśvāsigaḷiddāre – ādare avaralli heccinavaru avidhēyaru
